subject: Upgraded control Box
description_text:
Hello,

I bought the Simsonn Pro Plus pedals on Amazon in March of this year. They came with the old control box so I wanted to reach out to see how I could get the upgraded control box for them?

Also, I have recommended these pedals to many of my sim racing friends since I stared using them. Thanks for the affordable great product!

Thank you,
Wes Vance
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: 你好，Wvance92，     If you need support for the vibration feedback feature, please purchase our PlusX controller box along with the VAM Pro motor.   https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor       If you only need to upgrade the calibration software, you can follow the steps below.  Please download the latest calibration software, SIMSONN Manager version 2.0.8.  For the Pro Plus, go to the update interface and select “Manual Firmware Update,” then navigate to the pedals-firmware folder → pedals folder, and select the plus.sfu file to proceed with the update.   https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download     We also offer a damping and hydraulic rod upgrade kit.    https://www.simsonn.com/products/plus-ultra-upgrade-kit

Hello,

I am only looking for the upgraded control box at the moment, which I do
not see a link for here. Mine came with the old control box instead of the
new box. I have added screenshots. I have the one in the first however the
Amazon page says it was supposed to some with the upgraded box.

Thank you,
Wes

On Sat, Jul 12, 2025 at 2:50 AM support@simsonn.com
Hi Wvance92,     You can pay this difference link and we'll send you an updated Plus X control box with no shipping charges. https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference

Hello,

I'm confused on why I would have to pay for it when the amazon image
says that it comes with the upgraded box. It did not come with that
box, so I feel that you should be able to provide the upgraded box to
me without charge. I have added screenshots showing when I purchased
and that the upgraded control box was supposed to come with it.

Thank you,
Wes
Hi Wvance92,    Because this link has been updated, our product had not finished upgrading when you purchased it, thank you for your understanding.
